Title: Orchard Metro JS library
Description: Metro JS is a JavaScript plugin for jQuery developed to easily enable Metro interfaces on the web.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Metro JS is a JavaScript plugin for jQuery developed to easily enable Metro interfaces on the web, created by Drew Greenwell.

Try it
You can download the original package from the project website, where you can also "fiddle around" with it.

Metro JS for Orchard
Metro JS is also available for Orchard as a base module for developing further modules. You can get it from it's Orchard Gallery page (not yet created!) or through downloading or cloning this repository.

Get started
To start using Metro JS in your own Orchard module or theme, you just have to add the following lines of code to your view:

@{
    Script.Require("jQuery").AtHead();
    Script.Require("MetroJS.Script").AtHead();
    Style.Require("MetroJS.Style").AtHead();
}
